ContentGrouping.NoRulesYet: No content grouping rules have been created yet.
ContentGrouping.DeleteRuleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
ContentGrouping.RulesDescription: Define rules to group page URLs into named content groups. Rules are evaluated in priority order (lowest number first). The first matching rule wins.
ContentGrouping.ReportDocumentation: This report shows metrics grouped by content group. Content groups are defined by URL matching rules in the admin settings.
ContentGrouping.InvalidateDescription: If you have changed your content grouping rules, use this to invalidate cached reports for this website. Reports will be re-processed with the updated rules on the next archiving run or page load.
ContentGrouping.InvalidateSuccess: Reports have been successfully invalidated. They will be re-processed on the next archiving run.
ContentGrouping.InvalidateError: An error occurred while invalidating reports.
